tab1.text2: <TextStyle.Green>Sorry for the server down time this morning, Windows Server installed Windows updates and restarted the machine. I have set the server software to auto start and auto start the server if it happens again.</>
tab1.text4:
1.<TextStyle.Green>No Griefing or Trolling:</> Avoid actions that negatively impact the experience of other players, such as leading dangerous creatures to their bases or intentionally causing harm to their tames or structures.
2. <TextStyle.Green>Respect Taming and Building Rules:</> Be considerate of other survivors by not blocking critical resources, spawn points, or taming areas. Do not build excessively large or obstructive structures.
3. <TextStyle.Green>Report Bugs and Exploits:</> If you discover a game-breaking bug or exploit, report it to the server administrators rather than taking advantage of it. Exploiting game mechanics is not allowed.
4. <TextStyle.Green>Be a Helpful and Supportive Community Member:</> Assist new players, share knowledge, and be a positive presence on the server. Building a friendly and cooperative community is essential for a successful PvE experience.
5. <TextStyle.Green>No Blocking Obelisks and Artifacts:</> Do not build near or block access to obelisks, artifact caves, or other crucial map locations, as these are important for progression.
6. <TextStyle.Green>No Cave Blocking:</> Do not obstruct access to caves, as these locations are vital for players to explore and gather resources.
7. <TextStyle.Green>Follow Admin Guidelines:</> Respect the server administrators and moderators. They have the authority to enforce rules, resolve disputes, and maintain order on the server.
8. <TextStyle.Green>Report Rule Violations:</> If you witness someone breaking these rules, report it to the server administrators or moderators. Do not take matters into your own hands.

These rules are designed to foster a cooperative and enjoyable PvE environment for all players on the server. The Server Admin will typically enforce these rules to ensure a positive gaming experience for everyone.</>
